title: Beef Stir Fry
author: inesgosner
measurements: 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 2-inch strips
1 red bell peppers, but into matchsticks
instructions:
1. gather all ingredients
2. heat vegetable oil in large wok or skillet over medium-high heat;cook and stir beef until browned, 3 to 4 minutes
 3. Move beed to the side of the wok and add broccoli, bell pepper, carrots, green onion, and garlic to the center of the wok. Cook and stir vegtable for 2 minutes
4.Stir beef into vegtables and season with soy sauce and sesame seeds. Continue to cook and stir until vegtables are tender, about 2 more minutes. 
 5. Serve hot and enjoy!
